name: Colorbs
description:
**FLASH WARNING: THIS GAME CONTAINS FLASHING COLORS AND SCREEN SHAKE. PLEASE DO NOT PLAY IF YOU ARE SENSITIVE TO THESE EFFECTS!**
*Please Note: This project is unfinished, and will likely remain that way. Thank You!*

Colorbs is all about destroying the falling orbs before they reach the bottom of the screen! Simply launch a ball in any direction, and watch the mayhem! You earn an additional ball each time they are returned to you.

This was a fun, side project I made to test my skills. I had a lot of fun making it, and often got distracted  while playtesting because I didn't want it to be over! The best part is the explosion when you destroy an orb.
